# name

**Instance Property**

The contact’s name.

## Declaration

```swift
var name: String { get set }
```

## Configuring the Contact’s Attributes

- **image**: The contact’s image.
- **subtitle**: A subtitle that the template displays in addition to the contact’s name.
- **informativeText**: Additional text that the template displays.

items.description: A subtitle that the template displays in addition to the contact’s name.
items.name: subtitle

items.description: Additional text that the template displays.
items.name: informativeText

title: name
